short_summary: 500 Gal LOX Trailer 500 gallons, oxygen liquid
tags: Trade Agreement: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### 500 Gallon Liquid Oxygen Trailer Purchase  

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247723/A  
**Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2023 at 14:00:00  
**Contract Value of Purchase:**

The Department of National Defence, on behalf of the Government of Canada, is procuring a 500 gallon liquid oxygen trailer as part of an ongoing requirement to supply the Canadian Armed Forces.

The trailer will be used to transport and store liquid oxygen for fighter jets at the 25th Canadian Forces Support Department (CFSD) in Montreal. As per the procurement requirements, the delivery of the trailer must be completed by January 2024.

**Purchase Details:**

* **Product Quantity:** Two (2) trailers  
* **Product Code:** 3655-01-690-1839 (Transfer unit, Liquid oxygen)  
* **Part Number:** 50C0115-3  
* **Supplier Code (NCAGE):** 19062  

**Submission Procedure:**

Bidders are encouraged to submit their bids electronically through epost Connect service instead of the usual methods. Interested bidders may also refer to the bid solicitation document for further details.

**Language of Submission:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

Dany Lebel,  
Dany Lebel2@forces.gc.ca,  
(000) 000-0000  
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, Canada.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender notice, including the bid solicitation document, can be downloaded from the following link:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24947/w8485-247723-a---acan-en.pdf>  
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24947/w8485-247723-a---acan-fr.pdf>omas connect@canadabuys.canada.ca>
